about_the_game:
The world has plunged into terror as gruesome hordes of zombies overrun it. As the hero in this on-rails shooter, you'll navigate the zombie frontier amidst floating brains and intense action. Defending against zombie attacks and protecting survivors is crucial, adding depth to the captivating storyline unique to zombie shooters and apocalypse survival games. Tracking various enemies in the chaotic horde defense can be challenging, but once you unleash your inner demon, nothing can stop you from becoming the ultimate survivor! Trust us on that!

Immerse yourself in "Zombie Siege City," an FPS zombie shooter set in a terrifying near future where a deadly epidemic has turned the world into a zombie-infested battleground. Fight off a variety of zombies—from zombie prisoners and zombie dogs to epic boss monsters—using over 10 different weapons! Enjoy vibrant cartoon graphics and enhance your 3D pixel gun for greater damage, accuracy, reload speed, or ammo capacity. No zombie, no matter how relentless, can survive your determination to ensure humanity's survival. FPS zombie games have never been this thrilling! Don't miss out if you enjoy action-packed shooting games!

Key Features:
-Stunning 3D pixel cartoon graphics
-Realistic zombie reactions to hits, each type of zombie disintegrates uniquely
-User-friendly controls for a more engaging zombie-killing experience
-Over 20 types of zombies, including shooting zombies, zombie dogs, and more
-Formidable boss monsters
-A diverse arsenal featuring 10+ weapons, from revolvers to devastating weapons like rocket launchers
-Precision targeting with headshots for instant kills
-Skill-based FPS gameplay rewards health management, high headshot percentages, and offers bonus rewards
-Rail shooter mechanics

The post-apocalyptic world teeming with zombies poses many dangers, but you're prepared for every challenge it throws at you! Grab your weapon, enjoy the thrill of zombie shooting, and don't stop firing until every last zombie is... well and truly dead. Earn rewards for your efforts, unlock new weapons, upgrade existing ones, and exterminate as many walking dead as possible. In "Zombie Siege City," your survival skills are put to the ultimate test. Will you be the hero who saves humanity, or will you become another zombie's dinner?
